function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Variation in the built environment microbiome due to function, form, and organization of the building","Impact":"Potential for different microbial communities in different areas of the building, leading to diverse health risks","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection, proper ventilation, and air filtration systems","Technologies":"Air purifiers, air quality sensors, UV germicidal lamps","People":"Building occupants, facility maintenance staff","Owner":"Building management, facilities management"},{"Description":"Presence of core built environment microbiome dominated by specific bacterial taxa","Impact":"Potential for the spread of common indoor dust taxa and associated health risks","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection, air purifiers, and improved ventilation systems","Technologies":"Air purifiers, air quality sensors, UV germicidal lamps","People":"Building occupants, facility maintenance staff","Owner":"Building management, facilities management"}]}
